DataSource.Query: SELECT core.offices.office_code, finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id, finance.transaction_master.transaction_code, finance.transaction_master.reference_number, finance.transaction_master.book, finance.transaction_master.transaction_ts, finance.transaction_master.value_date, finance.transaction_master.book_date, account.users.name AS entered_by, core.verification_statuses.verification_status_name AS status, verified_by_user.name AS verified_by, finance.transaction_master.verification_reason, finance.cost_centers.cost_center_name FROM finance.transaction_master INNER JOIN core.offices ON finance.transaction_master.office_id = core.offices.office_id LEFT JOIN core.verification_statuses ON finance.transaction_master.verification_status_id = core.verification_statuses.verification_status_id INNER JOIN account.users ON finance.transaction_master.user_id=account.users.user_id LEFT JOIN finance.cost_centers ON finance.transaction_master.cost_center_id = finance.cost_centers.cost_center_id LEFT JOIN account.users AS verified_by_user ON finance.transaction_master.verified_by_user_id = verified_by_user.user_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = @transaction_master_id;

SELECT finance.accounts.account_number, finance.accounts.account_name, finance.cash_repositories.cash_repository_code + ' (' + finance.cash_repositories.cash_repository_name + ')' AS repository, finance.transaction_details.statement_reference, finance.transaction_details.currency_code, finance.transaction_details.er, CASE tran_type WHEN 'Dr' THEN amount_in_currency ELSE NULL END AS debit, CASE tran_type WHEN 'Cr' THEN amount_in_currency ELSE NULL END AS credit, CASE tran_type WHEN 'Dr' THEN amount_in_local_currency ELSE NULL END AS lc_debit, CASE tran_type WHEN 'Cr' THEN amount_in_local_currency ELSE NULL END AS lc_credit FROM finance.transaction_details INNER JOIN finance.accounts ON finance.transaction_details.account_id=finance.accounts.account_id LEFT JOIN finance.cash_repositories ON finance.transaction_details.cash_repository_id=finance.cash_repositories.cash_repository_id WHERE finance.transaction_details.transaction_master_id=@transaction_master_id ORDER BY tran_type DESC, amount_in_local_currency DESC;
